member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: PayTVP Api

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.GetUserInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: GEt user information

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.AddUser(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a card to PayCOMET. IMPORTANTES !!! This direct input must be activated by PayCOMET. In default input method card for PCI-DSS compliance should be AddUserUrl or AddUserToken (method used by BankStore JET)
member.param: card number without spaces or dashes
EXPDATE expiry date of the card, expressed as "MMYY" (two-digit month and year in two digits)

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.RemoveUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes a user through call soap PayCOMET

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.ExecutePurchase(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a web service payment
member.param: Risk scoring value of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.ExecutePurchaseDcc(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a web service payment with DCC operational

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.ConfirmPurchaseDcc(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Confirm a payment by web service with DCC operational
member.param: dccCurrency chosen currency transaction. It may be the product of PayCOMET native or selected by the end user. The amount will be sent in execute_purchase_dcc if the same product and become if different.
dccSession sent in the same session execute_purchase_dcc process.

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.ExecuteRefund(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a return of a payment web service
member.param: AuthCode de la operación original a devolver

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.CreateSubscription(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a subscription in PayCOMET on a card. IMPORTANTES !!! This direct input must be activated by PayCOMET. In default input method card for PCI-DSS compliance should be CreateSubscriptionUrl or CreateSubscriptionToken
member.param: card number without spaces or dashes
EXPDATE expiry date of the card, expressed as "MMYY" (two-digit month and year in two digits)
periodicity Frequency of subscription. In days.
Risk scoring value of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.EditSubscription(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Modifies a subscription PayCOMET on a card.
member.param: periodicity Frequency of subscription. In days.

EXECUTE If the registration process involves the payment of the first installment value DS_EXECUTE should be 1. If you only want to discharge from the subscription without being paid the first installment (will run with the parameters sent) its value must be 0.

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.RemoveSubscription(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a subscription PayCOMET on a card.

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.CreateSubscriptionToken(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a subscription in PayCOMET on a previously tokenized card.
member.param: periodicity Frequency of subscription. In days.
Risk scoring value of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

member.summary: Create a pre-authorization by web service
member.param: Risk scoring value of the transaction. Between 0 and 100

member.name: M:ApiPayCOMET_Csharp.Controllers.PayCOMETApiController.DeferredPreauthorizationConfirm(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Confirm deferred preauthorization by web service. Once and authorized an operation deferred pre-authorization can be confirmed for the effective recovery within 72 hours; after that date, deferred pre-authorizations lose their validity.
